about_the_game:
Thrack is a fox on a mission, in a crazy world on a quest for treasure upon a land of entertaining chaos! our hero is deadset on a new life. Become our anthropomorphic friend and join him on a grand adventure. seek grand riches, make friend from foe, fight pirates, solve puzzles, and do battle against striking enemies.

  • Play as an Anthropomorphic Fox

    Thrack The protagonist, a sword-wielding, hammer-holding, bow-bolstering anthropomorphic fox with a brash and bold attitude and the IQ of a walnut.

  • Meet with a Wild Assortment of Unhinged Characters

    Explore and discover a variety of NPCs who breathe new life into their reality through their dialogues. These characters that you will meet includ but are not limited to Dragons, Parrots, Dogs, Lions, Beavers and So Much More

  • Battle Insane Enemies

    Various boss battles can be found throughout the world, each one more incredulous than the last. Enemies Work Seamlessly Off Each Other's Motions: Using choreographed pathography, enemies can now seamlessly interact on each other's travel paths like never seen before! 

  • Collect Rare Treasures

    Throughout Thrack's game world is a wide assortment of rare, satisfying collectibles for you to find, from beefboxes to coins to fossils.

  • Beautiful PlayStation 1 Style Graphics and World

    Thrack's world is complete with an array of bright pastel colors, in a vibrant world with a paletted menu.

  • Thrack's Mission

    A Wolf on his death bed Reveals that he won't be giving Thrack a Key to an incredible Treasure because of his Foolishness, Now you must Travel the World in search for the Key and Treausure

  • Expand with Mods

    Thrack the Fox includes a Specialize in-game Modding API, allowing players to Create and Publish Mods from Inside the Game.

  • Specialized In-Game Modding API

    Contains special tools and modding support packaged right inside the game itself! - Allows for mods to be published straight from the game or downloaded and installed inside the menu features.

  • Defies Expectations

    Forgoes the standards of modern game design in an attempt to innovate!

Thrack is a fox on a mission, in a crazy world on a quest for treasure upon a land of entertaining chaos! our hero is deadset on a new life. Become our anthropomorphic friend and join him on a grand adventure. seek grand riches, make friend from foe, fight pirates, solve puzzles, and do battle against striking enemies.

  • Play as an Anthropomorphic Fox

    Thrack The protagonist, a sword-wielding, hammer-holding, bow-bolstering anthropomorphic fox with a brash and bold attitude and the IQ of a walnut.

  • Meet with a Wild Assortment of Unhinged Characters

    Explore and discover a variety of NPCs who breathe new life into their reality through their dialogues. These characters that you will meet includ but are not limited to Dragons, Parrots, Dogs, Lions, Beavers and So Much More

  • Battle Insane Enemies

    Various boss battles can be found throughout the world, each one more incredulous than the last. Enemies Work Seamlessly Off Each Other's Motions: Using choreographed pathography, enemies can now seamlessly interact on each other's travel paths like never seen before! 

  • Collect Rare Treasures

    Throughout Thrack's game world is a wide assortment of rare, satisfying collectibles for you to find, from beefboxes to coins to fossils.

  • Beautiful PlayStation 1 Style Graphics and World

    Thrack's world is complete with an array of bright pastel colors, in a vibrant world with a paletted menu.

  • Thrack's Mission

    A Wolf on his death bed Reveals that he won't be giving Thrack a Key to an incredible Treasure because of his Foolishness, Now you must Travel the World in search for the Key and Treausure

  • Expand with Mods

    Thrack the Fox includes a Specialize in-game Modding API, allowing players to Create and Publish Mods from Inside the Game.

  • Specialized In-Game Modding API

    Contains special tools and modding support packaged right inside the game itself! - Allows for mods to be published straight from the game or downloaded and installed inside the menu features.

  • Defies Expectations

    Forgoes the standards of modern game design in an attempt to innovate!
name: Thrack The Fox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD A8-6410 APU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R5 Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
